title: 6g/8g compiler segfault
body:
by **fibercut**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. 6g boo.go
2. 8g boo.go

What is the expected output?
a somewhat descriptive error message, eg. *net.Conn is pointer to interface, not
interface

What do you see instead?

> 6g boo.go
zsh: segmentation fault  6g boo.go

$ 8g boo.go 
boo.go:13: internal compiler error: fault

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g, 8g

Which operating system are you using?
6g on
Linux 2.6.35-24-generic #42-Ubuntu SMP Thu Dec 2 02:41:37 UTC 2010 x86_64 GNU/Linux
8g on
Linux 2.6.32-26-generic-pae #48-Ubuntu SMP Wed Nov 24 10:31:20 UTC 2010 i686 GNU/Linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
f814f61fdbab tip

Please provide any additional information below.
%s/\*//g fixes the example
Attachments: 1. boo.go (193 bytes)
